src:
Listyo Sigit Prabowo, Calon Kabareskrim Mantan Ajudan Jokowi
01 Nov 2019 by Muhammad Hendartyo, Jobpie Sugiharto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Nama Inspektur Jenderal Listyo Sigit Prabowo mencuat sebagai calon Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal (Kabareskrim) Polri pengganti Komisaris Jenderal Idham Aziz.
Kursi Kabareskrim kosong setelah Idham menjabat Kapolri, menggantikan Tito Karnavian yang ditunjuk Presiden Jokowi sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri.
Menurut beberapa pejabat di Kepolisian, pesaing Listyo adalah Kapolda Metro Jaya Inspektur Jenderal Gatot Eddy Pramono. Listyo saat ini menjabat Kepala Divisi Profesi dan Pengamanan (Kadiv Propam) Polri.
Listyo lulusan Akademi Kepolisian tahun 1991. Pada 2014 dia didapuk sebagai Ajudan Presiden Jokowi. Sekitar dua tahun kemudian dia menjabat Kapolda Banten dengan pangkat brigadir jenderal.
Nasib baik menghampirinya pagi pada Agustus 2018.
Pada Agustus 2018, dia menyandang pangkat inspektur jenderal yang disematkan oleh Kapolri Jenderal Tito Karnavian di Mabes Polri.Tak lama, Listyo dipromosikan menjadi Kadiv Propam Polri berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Kapolri (Skep) Nomor 81/ 2014 A/III/KEP./2018 tertanggal 13 Agustus 2018.
Perwira tinggi kelahiran 5 Mei 1969 tersebut pernah menjadi Kapolres Pati, Jawa Tengah. Setelah itu dia menduduki posisi Wakil Kapoltabes Kota Semarang lalu Kapolres Solo.
Adapun pada 2012, pada saat Jokowi menjabat Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Listyo Sigit Prabowo dirotasi ke Jakarta dengan pos Asubdit II Direktorat Tipdum Bareskrim Polri.
Sebelum menjabat Ajudan Presiden Jokowi, pada Mei 2013, Listyo bertugas sebagai Direktur Reserse Kriminal Umum (Reskrimum) Polda Sulawesi Tenggara.
Dia lulusan S-2 dari Universitas Indonesia. Tesis yang dipilih Listyo Sigit Prabowo adalag tentang penanganan konflik etnis di Kalijodo, Jakarta.
Kapolri terpilih Komisaris Jenderal Idham Azis berjanji segera menunjuk Kabareskrim Polri.
"Dan sesaat nanti saya akan menunjuk Kabareskrim yang baru untuk segera mempercepat pengungkapan kasus Novel," kata Idham Azis setelah Rapat Paripurna DPR pengesahan dirinya sebagai Kapolri di Gedung DPR pada Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Rencananya, Presiden Jokowi melantik Idham hari ini, Jumat, 1 November 2019.

HENDARTYO HANGGI | ANDITA RAHMA
text:
Listyo Sigit Prabowo, Candidate of Kabareskrim Former Aide Jokowi
01 Nov 2019 by Muhammad Hendartyo, Jobpie Sugiharto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Inspector General Listyo Sigit Prabowo's name has emerged as a candidate for the Head of the National Police Criminal Investigation Agency (Kabareskrim) replacing Commissioner General Idham Aziz.
The Kabareskrim chair was vacant after Idham took the position of National Police Chief, replacing Tito Karnavian who was appointed by President Jokowi as Minister of the Interior.
According to several officials in the Police, Listyo's competitor was the Jakarta Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono. Listyo currently serves as the Head of the Indonesian Police's Professional and Security Division (Kadiv Propam).
Listyo graduated from the Police Academy in 1991. In 2014 he was lined up as President Jokowi's Aide. About two years later he served as Banten Police Chief with the rank of Brigadier General.
Good luck approached him early in the morning in August 2018.
In August 2018, he assumed the rank of inspector general pinned by National Police Chief General Tito Karnavian at the National Police Headquarters. Shortly, Listyo was promoted to the National Police Headquarters in accordance with the Decree of the Chief of Police (Skep) Number 81/2014 A / III / KEP. / 2018 dated 13 August 2018.
The high-ranking officer born on May 5, 1969 was once the Pati Police Chief, Central Java. After that he occupied the position of Deputy Head of Semarang City Police and then the Solo Police Chief.
As for 2012, when Jokowi was the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Listyo Sigit Prabowo was rotated to Jakarta with the Asubdit II post of the Directorate of Police Criminal Investigation Tipdum.
Before serving as President Jokowi's Aide, in May 2013, Listyo served as the Director of the General Criminal Investigation (Reskrimum) of the Southeast Sulawesi Regional Police.
He graduated from the University of Indonesia, S-2. The thesis chosen by Listyo Sigit Prabowo is about handling ethnic conflict in Kalijodo, Jakarta.
Chief of Police elected Commissioner General Idham Azis promised to immediately appoint the Police Kabareskrim.
"And soon I will appoint a new Kabareskrim to expedite the disclosure of the Novel case," Idham Azis said after the DPR Plenary Session endorsing him as National Police Chief at the Parliament Building on Thursday, 31 October 2019.
The plan, President Jokowi inaugurates Idham today, Friday, November 1, 2019.

HENDARTYO HANGGI | ANDITA RAHMA
